data.message:
I need to talk to ALIVE person, my sister's account got disabled after using her account on your stupid advertising system and she sent to you her ID but no one to help...

How do I contact you guys ? any phone number to give you a call ? (She is in Egypt but she may call USA )

I'm really sick of Facebook 
#Facebook_victim

replies.message:
I hate to tell you that I know no one will answer 
I know .... this is frustration.
Anyway thanks god because she decided to invest $1000/Month in this stupid system but after what happen she will think thousands of times before spending a single dollar.

We should NOT give money to this facebook...as they have no customer service or even trying to show some Respect to customers.

#Facebook_victim
no.... even don't know how to contact those ppl !!

George..... we've sent this request twice with no feedback 

any ideas ?
Hi Hossam. We appreciate your patience as our team reviews your report. In the meantime, you may be able to track the status of your report in the Support Dashboard:http://on.fb.me/1fwx4nv -Kristen

Kristen...Thank you for your reply
How may I use this and the account is already deactivate by Facebook ? I can't log-in and that's the problem in the 1st place!

Hi George. Likewise, if you've reported something for violating the Facebook Terms, you may have the option to check the status of your report in the Support Dashboard here:http://on.fb.me/1fwxDh7 -Kristen
